class_notes: This course will explore our perception of sights and sounds. We will investigate how visual and auditory stimuli contribute to, or disrupt, our health and well-being, how their processing pathways may be disrupted, and potential interventions to restore these critical sensory modalities.
course_description: Through examination of the physiology underlying these sensory systems, mechanisms of disruption, treatment methods, and impact on health and well-being, this course integrates the two components of the Human Health major, science and human experience.
sections: Class Nbr: 2582, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: A. Freeman, Status: Open
